title: Cary Fukunaga Takes Over the Bond Franchise, Plus a Live Performance From the Altons | The Watch (Ep. 291)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan sits down with GQ staff writer Zach Baron to talk about the news that Cary Fukunaga will direct ‘Bond 25’ (1:45) and Fukunaga’s new Netflix show ‘Maniac’ (13:06). Then Los Angeles–based band the Altons perform live in The Ringer studio (19:40) before Chris sits down with them to talk about how they got their start in music (36:42).

Read Zach’s profile of Cary Fukunaga here.
Read Miles Surrey on the pros and cons of Fukunaga directing ‘Bond 25’ here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
